problem_text_cn: 如图所示，Div(LengthOfLine(AD)=LengthOfLine(DB))，Div(LengthOfLine(AD)=LengthOfLine(DB))。求直线AB的长度与直线DB的长度之比。
problem_text_en: As shown in the diagram, Div(LengthOfLine(AD)=LengthOfLine(DB)), Div(LengthOfLine(AD)=LengthOfLine(DB)). Find the ratio of the length of line AB to the length of line DB.
